name: StarDust (itch) (RedBellPepper)
description:
A small sci-fi Shooter set in space. This was a little experiment to create a Shooter game from scratch by trying to make a Quest system without help from the Internet. This also acts a  step for learning saving and loading game data . 

All the Assets used in the game  are made from scratch. 

Optimization for lower-end mobile devices was key in creating the Project.
